SELECT b.board_no, u.user_nickname, b.board_category, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_date, b.board_hit FROM TB_BOARD b, TB_USER u WHERE b.user_id = u.user_id
AND b.board_category = #{board_category}
AND u.user_nickname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND b.board_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND b.board_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY b.board_no ASC
